subject: Golf
Scottish Open (Golf)
British Open (Golf)
John Deere Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Spieth shot a career-best 10-under-par 61 on Saturday to take a two-shot lead at 17 under going into the final round of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill.
snippet: Spieth shot a career-best 10-under-par 61 on Saturday to take a two-shot lead at 17 under going into the final round of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill.
